review: Better than expected,well worth the money
author: Steven

review: I love the fire stick but it was a pain to hook up. I ended up asking the young man next door to help me. He got it hooked up but it was in German and he had a difficult time switching it to English. I'm enjoying it now though.
author: knit one

review: This Fire TV Stick, works good with Netflix and does not need to be attached to Amazon Prime.  It is easy to install, and it takes less then 10 minutes.  D. Sterling
author: Dorothy Sterling

review: Absolutely love it. Very easy to install and simple to use...
author: Jolee Layton "JoLee - voracious reader"

review: Love it. We started with Chromecast but I like the remote that comes with the fitestick. You can pause, rewind and forward shows without unlocking your phone or tablet.  If we are watching a lot of short videos in YouTube the Chromecast is better for searching since you use a full keyboard.
author: Raymond

review: Works Great! Lots of options to watch shows I wouldn't normally be able to watch without a hbo subscription.
author: Dezndance

review: Great I love this product ..... I should have bought this much sooner
author: Everton Lowell
